title: I-Thai Restaurant and Sushi Bar
typeOfFood: Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Modern decor restaurant and bar in Georgetown shopping district. Veg/vegan choices include appetizers such as spring rolls, fresh garden rolls, and corn fritters; soups such as tom kha and tom yum; plus seaweed salad, vegetable sushi; and mains like curry, rice, and noodle dishes can be made with vegetables and fried or soft tofu.
